document_data.name: Drasus
document_data.mainbody:
'''Drasus''' was an [[Iron Throne]] agent that operated in the [[Sword Coast]] region of [[Faerûn]] during the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|No need for bloodshed? There's an incredible need for bloodshed! We've been looking forward to it all day!|Drasus}}
document_data.Personality: Drasus had great confidence in the combat prowess of himself and his allies. He also had a lively sense of humor and felt great enthusiasm for violence.
document_data.Possessions: He wore a suit of [[chain mail]] armor and wielded a ''+1 [[morning star]]'' in battle.
document_data.Relationships: Drasus was the leader of a band that included three other individuals, a fellow warrior by the name of [[Genthore]], and two [[mage]]s, [[Kysus]] and [[Rezden]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Drasus and his group were tasked by [[Rieltar Anchev]] with escorting [[Davaeorn]] to the [[Cloak Wood mine]] and defending its entrance from intruders.

Some time later they encountered [[Abdel Adrian]] and his companions, hoping to defeat the young [[Bhaalspawn]] after so many Throne-hired bounty hunters had failed.
